title: Stop Making Bad Decisions: Heal Your Decision Making Anxiety & Learn How to Make Good Decisions
description: In this book, you will learn about:1. Decision Making Anxiety2. Best Thought Level Approaches to Deal with It ( Number 3 is my favourite)3. Four Keys to Unlocking Good Decisions (The FNPJ System of Decision Making)4. Exercises you can do with any Writing Tool ( Pen, Paper, Device, App) to improve your Decision Making SkillsImagine what it would feel like to rely upon a balanced system for decision making to guide you through the rough patches and cross-roads in your life. The FNPJ System of Decision Making provides you with a powerful framework, while allowing room and breadth for using & customising it according to your unique life situation. Health, Wealth & Relationships - All the areas of your life will be powerfully and positively impacted by knowing the intuitive yet unconscious knowledge contained within this book. Author Akanksha Sharma is a Psychological Counsellor with deep interest in the fields of Decision Making and Decision Making Anxiety. If you like books such as Thinking in Bets, then you will enjoy 'Stop Making Bad Decisions'.
author: Akanksha  Sharma
